text: Janis Carter (born Janis Elinore Dremann, October 10, 1913 - July 30, 1994) was an American actress. She acted on the stage, in movies, and on television. She appeared in over 30 movies during her career. She played Dorothy Anderson in the movie One Mysterious Night. She also played Peggy in Miss Grant Takes Richmond. Carter was born in Cleveland, Ohio. She died in Durham, North Carolina after having a heart attack at age 80. title: Janis Carter
